title: Wave--Particle Duality in Swirl--String Theory: \\ Toroidal Circulation, Knot Collapse, and Photon-Induced Transitions
description:
We present a Swirl--String Theory (SST) interpretation of the electronâ€™s
wave--particle duality based on Canon v0.3.1.
The electron is modeled as a swirl-string admitting two phases:
an unknotted, delocalized toroidal circulation.
